mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attach ( attach_id, con_key1, con_key2, con_key3, org_file_name, server_file_name, file_size, insert_dtm ) VALUES ( attach_id_seq.nextval, CASE WHEN #{con_key1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} IS NOT NULL THEN #{con_key1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ELSE NULL END, CASE WHEN #{con_key2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} IS NOT NULL THEN #{con_key2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ELSE NULL END, CASE WHEN #{con_key3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} IS NOT NULL THEN #{con_key3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ELSE NULL END, #{org_file_name}, #{server_file_name}, #{file_size}, sysdate )
mapper.select: SELECT a.server_file_name FROM attach a JOIN appr_line al ON a.con_key3 = al.doc_no WHERE al.doc_no = #{doc_no}
SELECT a.server_file_name FROM attach a JOIN notice no ON a.con_key2 = no.notice_no WHERE no.notice_no = #{notice_no}

SELECT a.server_file_name FROM attach a
JOIN message m ON a.con_key1 = m.msg_no WHERE m.msg_no = #{msg_no}
SELECT a.server_file_name, a.org_file_name, a.file_size FROM attach a JOIN message m ON a.con_key1 = m.msg_no WHERE m.msg_no = #{msg_no}
